settings.title: Contact Us
settings.description: Email us at returns@invictatools.co.uk with your order number and reason for return. We'll respond within 1 business day.

settings.title: Get Your RMA Number
settings.description: We'll issue a Return Merchandise Authorisation (RMA) number and provide return shipping instructions.

settings.title: Pack & Ship
settings.description: Pack the item securely in its original packaging, include the RMA number, and ship it to the address provided.

settings.title: Refund Processed
settings.description: Once we receive and inspect the item, your refund will be processed within 1-2 business days to your original payment method.

settings.title: Cut-to-Size & Custom Orders
settings.description: Items that have been cut, modified, or custom-made to your specifications cannot be returned unless faulty.

settings.title: Opened Safety Equipment
settings.description: For hygiene and safety reasons, PPE and safety equipment that has been opened or used cannot be returned.

settings.title: Clearance & Special Offer Items
settings.description: Items purchased at clearance or heavily discounted promotional prices are sold as final sale and cannot be returned.

settings.heading: Returns & Refunds
settings.subheading: We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase. If something isn't right, our returns process is straightforward.
